verbs.description: OKLAHOMA CITY- A prominent Oklahoman will soon take up a new position in Washington . The Senate Armed Services Committee has approved Greg Slavonic to be the assistant secretary of the Navy for manpower and reserve affairs . Slavonic was nominated by President Donald Trump a few months ago .

[ARG0: OKLAHOMA CITY- A prominent Oklahoman] [ARGM-MOD: will] [ARGM-TMP: soon] [V: take] up [ARG1: a new position in Washington] . The Senate Armed Services Committee has approved Greg Slavonic to be the assistant secretary of the Navy for manpower and reserve affairs . Slavonic was nominated by President Donald Trump a few months ago .
